item.description: This page provides details on how to set up your development environment to work with Oracle Backend for Spring Boot and Microservices. The following platforms are recommended for a development environment: Microsoft Windows 10 or 11, preferrably with Windows Subsystem for Linux 2 macOS (11 or later recommended) on Intel or Apple silicon Linux, for example Oracle Linux, Ubuntu, and so on.
